import { Container, Button, Nav, Navbar as NavbarBs } from "react-bootstrap"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuthContext } from "../hooks/useAuthContext"; import { useLogout } from "../hooks/useLogout"; export const Navbar = () => { const {user} = useAuthContext(); //to see user in context return (
Home Products About {user && ( Account )} {!user && ( Login ) } {/* shopping cart button */}
); };
